title: House For Rent  $1880 Monthly
posting_body: Looking for a responsible adult to rent a 2 bedroom house.
Must be able to sign a ONE YEAR lease
Rent $1880
Deposit $1880 can be split into 2 months.
Need to be able to pay utilities and rent on time monthly.
NO Pets, Not 4/20 Friendly, No smoking in the house.
Must be Employed Full Time.
Quite neighborhood, plenty of street parking, 1 car garage
Giant fenced in backyard with lawn, sprinkler system and patio.
Must have verifiable full time employment and great references for all tenants.
Tenet responsible for all utilities including power, water, trash, ect... and
maintenance of the property including lawn, yard and the interior of the house.
Must be able to mow a lawn, maintain vegetation, minor home repairs as needed.
Owners are usually out of town.
If you have good references and a verifiable employment please contact text or phone
# Seven 2 Zero - 2 three 1-two 5 five 4.
If you can't read this then you are a bot or not a good fit.
Serious inquiries only.
NO email.
Phone calls or Text only.
We Do Not rent out rooms unless we meet you.
So call to set up an appointment to come see the house.
Looking forward to meeting you.
Maria
